td.content: s:patient presents with 9 days history of Body Aches. pt is a white male aged 76 yrs. he smokes one pack/day for 3 years he drinks alcohol occasionally o:Height 67 in, Weight 117 lbs, Temperature 98.7 F, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 15 a:Lyme Disease p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed amoxicillin/calvulanate - 875 mg 2x day.
